page.description: Lists the available destination to capture the streaming change events from a source database. You can search a destination by its name or sort the list by the count of active pipelines using a destination.

create.title: Create destination
create.description: To configure and create a connector fill out the below form or use the smart editor to setup a new destination connector. If you already have a configuration file, you can setup a new destination connector by uploading it in the smart editor.

catalog.title: Destination catalog
catalog.description: Add a destination to capture the change data event. To start select a connector below once you select a connector you can configure it using form or smart editor option. You can also search the connector by its name or toggle the catalog between the list view or card view.

edit.title: Edit destination
edit.description: Edit the destination connector details using the below form or smart editor.
